title: Acting president condoles over deaths in Washuk raod accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 29 (APP): Acting President Syed Yusuf Raza Gilani on Wednesday expressed grief over the loss of lives in a traffic accident that took place in Balochistanâ€™s Washuk area.
He prayed to Allah Almighty for peace for the departed souls and strength to the bereaved families to bear the loss.
He also prayed for the quick and complete recovery of those injured in the tragic incident.
